channel.title: *** The-Genesis *OFFICIAL RELEASE!* - Bringing back the fun.*** win free donator
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://genesis-rsps.net/public/style_images/4_index.png[/img] Ignore the domain in banner, Was my old one from my last project.
WIN FREE DONATOR RANK & $25 to spend!!
Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/47033981/Genesis-Rsps.jar
Website: http://genesis-rsps.net/
Genesis eco server
This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
[b]* Stable and lag-free dedicated server. * Unique old-school style of gameplay. * Training island for starters with 15 minutes increased XP. * Two levels of donator ranks & benefits. * Fully functional pking supplies and locations. * Great wilderness locations for money-making. * Full slayer tower with a unique and simple way of training. * Excellent Economy. * Great Community. * Pk Point Shop. * Active & Professional Staff. * All Godwars Bosses. * Spirit Beast. * Chaos Elemental. * Perfect Switching. * Spirit Shields. * Dragon Kiteshields. * Fightcave & Jad. * Fully Functional Skills. * Much more..[/b]
[IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2vtulgg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/28higs4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/raol1y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2n1769t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/1tn0uo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2z4l0ex.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@genesisrspss wrote:

[CENTER]
Ignore the domain in banner, Was my old one from my last project.

WIN FREE DONATOR RANK & $25 to spend!!

Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/47033981/Genesis-Rsps.jar

Website: http://genesis-rsps.net/

Genesis eco server

This basically means there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we’re not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.

[b]* Stable and lag-free dedicated server.

  • Unique old-school style of gameplay.
  • Training island for starters with 15 minutes increased XP.
  • Two levels of donator ranks & benefits.
  • Fully functional pking supplies and locations.
  • Great wilderness locations for money-making.
  • Full slayer tower with a unique and simple way of training.
  • Excellent Economy.
  • Great Community.
  • Pk Point Shop.
  • Active & Professional Staff.
  • All Godwars Bosses.
  • Spirit Beast.
  • Chaos Elemental.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Spirit Shields.
  • Dragon Kiteshields.
  • Fightcave & Jad.
  • Fully Functional Skills.
  • Much more…[/b]
